reviewText: Oh to bring back the olden time was great. This was a good dvd thanks.

I hosted a disco halloween party.  After a few hours of heavy duty disco dancing, half the party crashed in my living room where I had this DVD playing non-stop.  I couldn't believe how many people were gathered around that TV dancing in their seats and occasionally laughing really loud.  Everyone asked, "WHERE did you find this?  This is great!"  I said, "Amazon, of course."

The Best of Soul Train Vol. 8 (Time Life) DVD 2010This Volume features a Basketball game between Don Cornelius and Marvin Gaye, with Smokey Robinson as the official! Performances by Aretha Franklin,"Rock Steady" with the Soul Train Dancers. The Staple Singers, Isaac Hayes, The O'Jays, "Love Train". Kool and the Gang, "Jungle Boogie". LaBelle, "Lady Marmalade" and MORE!!!
